thread.title: Etihad to bring the A380 to New York
thread.title_full: Etihad to bring the A380 to New York

author: eTN Editor
title: Etihad to bring the A380 to New York
text:
Click here for information and nomination Etihad to bring the A380 to New York 
A new level of luxury onboard the Etihad Airways flight from Abu Dhabi to New York will begin ahead of schedule. The new aircraft is fitted with the one of a kind luxury accommodation named the Suite in the Sky, a three room apartment. 
The route by Etihad Airways between Abu Dhabi and JFK airport in New York onboard a luxury airliner will commence ahead of schedule. The reason for the rescheduling of this flight is that the aircraft to be used is now ready for service. 
The new aircraft to be used on this route is the Airbus A380. This new aircraft will replace the Boeing 777 that is currently flying this route. This aircraft flying the route to New York will have the Suite in the Sky available to passengers. This is a luxurious three room suite. This suite also comes with a chauffeur driven limousine bringing the passengers to the airport and the plane. Once in the suite, the passengers will have access to the living room with its reclining lounge chair that easily converts to a flat bed measuring 80.5” long. This private suite also has a shower available for them to use exclusively. For the viewing pleasure of the occupants of the suite, there is a 32” flat screen in the living room and a separate 24” flat screen monitor in the bed room. Oct 22, 2015
